metrics.name: jira_active_issues
metrics.jql: status IN ("To Do", "Selected for development","In Progress", "QA")

metrics.name: jira_updated_2d
metrics.description: Issues with activity in the last two days

metrics.name: jira_updated_5d
metrics.description: Latest activity more than 2 and less than 5 days ago

metrics.name: jira_updated_10d
metrics.description: Latest activity more than 5 and less than 10 days ago

metrics.name: jira_updated_4w
metrics.description: Latest activity more than 10 days and less than 4 weeks ago

metrics.name: jira_updated_26w
metrics.description: Latest activity more than a month and less than half a year ago

metrics.name: jira_updated_older
metrics.description: Latest activity more than half a year ago

metrics.name: jira_current_week_started
metrics.jql: status CHANGED FROM "Selected for development" TO "In progress" AFTER startOfWeek()

metrics.name: jira_current_week_done
metrics.jql: status CHANGED TO "Done" AFTER startOfWeek() AND status="Done"

metrics.name: jira_current_week_started_done
metrics.description: Issues both started and finished during current week
metrics.jql: status CHANGED FROM "Selected for development" TO "In progress" AFTER startOfWeek() AND status="Done"

metrics.name: jira_last_week_started_current_week_done
metrics.description: Issues started during last week, but finished during this week
metrics.jql: (status CHANGED FROM "Selected for development" TO "In progress" AFTER startOfWeek("-1") BEFORE startOfWeek()) AND (status CHANGED TO "Done" AFTER startOfWeek()) AND status="Done"

metrics.name: jira_total_qa
metrics.description: Number of issues currently in QA

metrics.name: jira_total_in_progress
metrics.description: Number of issues currently In progress

metrics.name: jira_total_reopened
metrics.description: Number of issues reopened at some point during their lifespan
